page.title: 14GOLF COURSES AROUND ALVA
page.content: The nine hole course in Alva is a major attraction. It is situated on the slopes of the Ochil Hills. It has quite a large membership including wandering sheep! There is a small club house. Children are allowed to use the course. The disadvantage is the hilly site but it is close by the town and handy for people to get to. The Tillicoultry course also has{nine {holes}and a club house. Unlike Alva's golf course it doesn't have any hilly bits. There are a lot more lady golfers in the{club}because the course is easier to play on. Golf addicts can get more{recreation}by playing on the courses at Schawpark and Dunblane.
